Curse of the Wolf Man

Release date:
January 1, 1994

James's old star rating:

★★☆☆☆

"average or below"

James's old number rating:

5/10

Old site description:

This marked the beginning of a new way to make movies without actors. I had no figures, toys or puppets that looked like The Wolf Man, so I just drew the whole story on paper in sequential panels like a comic book and videotaped them while playing music in the background and narrating the story. I also spoke the dialogue of all the characters, just like in all my puppet/figure films.

James's old ratings:

Back in 2003 James included star ratings with each film he listed on his filmography on his website.

Later on he switched to ratings out of ten.

Eventually, he dropped the ratings entirely.

This archive is unoffical and run by a fan of Cinemassacre. Contact the Archivist
